content:
TITLE: Implementing Color Scheme with CSS Custom Properties in Material Web DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to define a color scheme using CSS custom properties for Material Web components. It shows the root-level declaration of color tokens and an example of how to use these tokens in custom components. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/theming/color.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` :root { /* Generated from Material Theme Builder Figma plugin or `material-color-utilities`. */ --md-sys-color-primary: #006A6A; --md-sys-color-on-primary: #FFFFFF; --md-sys-color-primary-container: #6FF7F6; --md-sys-color-on-primary-container: #002020; /* ... */ } /* Usage in custom components */ .primary { background: var(--md-sys-color-primary); color: var(--md-sys-color-on-primary); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Shape Tokens for Material Web Components in CSS DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to set custom shape tokens for small, medium, and large corners using CSS custom properties. These tokens control the corner roundness of Material Web components. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/theming/shape.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` :root { --md-sys-shape-corner-small: 4px; --md-sys-shape-corner-medium: 6px; --md-sys-shape-corner-large: 8px; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Text Field Implementation - HTML DESCRIPTION: Shows basic usage of filled and outlined text field variants with labels and values. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Material Web Components via CDN in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use Material Web Components through a CDN (esm.run) for fast prototyping. It includes setting up an import map, importing components, and using them in the HTML body. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/quick-start.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

Hello Material!

Check out these controls in a form!

Reset
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing and Using Typescale Styles in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: This TypeScript code shows how to import typescale styles from Material Web Components and apply them to a LitElement component or document. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/theming/typography.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import {styles as typescaleStyles} from '@material/web/typography/md-typescale-styles.js'; // `typescaleStyles.styleSheet` is a `CSSStyleSheet` that can be added to a // document or shadow root's `adoptedStyleSheets` to use the `.md-typescale-*` // classes. document.adoptedStyleSheets.push(typescaleStyles.styleSheet); // `typescaleStyles` can also be added to a `LitElement` component's styles. class App extends LitElement { static styles = [typescaleStyles, css`...`]; render() { return html`

Large display

Body text

`; } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Material Web Components with CDN DESCRIPTION: A complete example showing how to set up Material Web components using CDN imports. Demonstrates usage of typography, form controls, and basic styling. Includes importmap configuration, component initialization, and basic layout styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

Hello Material!

Check out these controls in a form!

Reset
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Design Tokens Using CSS Custom Properties DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to customize Material Design tokens using CSS custom properties to define system colors and typography preferences. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/intro.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` :root { --md-sys-color-primary: olive; --md-sys-color-secondary: tomato; --md-ref-typeface-brand: 'Open Sans'; --md-ref-typeface-plain: system-ui; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Text Field Properties DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive set of configurable properties for text field components, including validation, styling, and interaction controls SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: TypeScript CODE: ``` { error: boolean; errorText: string; label: string; required: boolean; value: string; type: string; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Accessible Buttons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add accessibility features to buttons using the aria-label attribute. It shows an elevated button with a more descriptive label for screen readers. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Add ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Constraint Validation for Material Web Text Fields DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use browser constraint validation with Material Web text fields in a form, including required fields and pattern matching. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Basic Menu with ID Reference in HTML and JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a basic menu using the md-menu component with an anchor button. It shows setting up the menu structure and using JavaScript to toggle the menu's open state. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/menu.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Set with idref
Apple
Banana
Cucumber
 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Comparing Browser and Material Web Components Implementation DESCRIPTION: Shows a side-by-side comparison of traditional HTML form elements versus their Material Web Component equivalents, demonstrating how MWC components can be used as drop-in replacements for standard HTML elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/intro.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Reset Submit
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Manual Validation for Material Web Text Fields DESCRIPTION: Shows how to manually control the error state and error message of a Material Web text field when driven by application state logic. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Component-Level Tokens DESCRIPTION: Shows how to customize both direct values and system token references for component-specific styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/theming/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` :root { --md-filled-button-container-shape: 0px; } md-filled-button.error { --md-filled-button-container-color: var(--md-sys-color-error); --md-filled-button-label-text-color: var(--md-sys-color-on-error); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enhancing Accessibility for Material Web Text Fields DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to improve accessibility of Material Web text fields by adding aria-label attributes for external labels or more descriptive labels. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Username
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Accessibility Labels to Icon Buttons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to improve accessibility by adding aria-label attributes to icon buttons for more descriptive labels. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/icon-button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` search ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Accessible Autocomplete Menu in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create an accessible autocomplete menu using Material Web Components. It includes a text field with appropriate ARIA attributes and a menu with option items. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/menu.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Alabama
Alabama
 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Theming Filled Select Component with CSS DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to apply custom theming to a filled select component using CSS variables. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/select.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Apple
Tomato
 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Accessible Toggle Icon Buttons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add separate aria labels for selected and unselected states of a toggle icon button. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/icon-button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` close check ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessible Icon Implementation DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to implement accessible icons using aria-label for both codepoint and SVG implementations. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/icon.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```  ``` LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Outlined Button with CSS DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to customize an outlined button using CSS custom properties. It adjusts the button's shape, font, and colors to create a unique themed appearance. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Outlined ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Character Counter Text Field - HTML DESCRIPTION: Shows implementation of a text field with character counter using maxlength attribute. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessible Switch Implementation DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates proper accessibility implementation using aria-label attributes for switches with and without visible labels. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/switch.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Outlined and Filled Buttons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create outlined and filled buttons using Material Design components. It shows the basic usage of md-outlined-button and md-filled-button elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Back Complete ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Textarea Implementation - HTML/CSS DESCRIPTION: Shows how to implement a multi-line text field with vertical resize capability. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` md-filled-text-field { resize: vertical; } ``` LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Text Fields with Supporting Text - HTML DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates text fields with supporting text and required field indicators. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Theming a Filled Material Web Text Field DESCRIPTION: Illustrates how to customize the appearance of a filled Material Web text field using CSS custom properties for shape, typography, and colors. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Web Components in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet demonstrates how to use Material Web Components in markup after importing them. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/quick-start.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` Back Next ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Text Button in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a text button using Material Design Web Components. Text buttons are used for the lowest priority actions, especially when presenting multiple options. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Text ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Custom Typefaces with CSS Variables DESCRIPTION: This CSS snippet demonstrates how to import a custom font and set typeface variables for brand and plain text using CSS custom properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/theming/typography.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open%20Sans:wght@400;500;700&display=swap'); :root { --md-ref-typeface-brand: 'Open Sans'; --md-ref-typeface-plain: system-ui; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Outlined Button in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create an outlined button using the Material Design Web Components. Outlined buttons are medium-emphasis buttons for important, but not primary actions. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Outlined ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Theming an Outlined Material Web Text Field DESCRIPTION: Shows how to customize the appearance of an outlined Material Web text field using CSS custom properties for shape, typography, and colors. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/text-field.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Dialog Usage in HTML DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic structure of a dialog component with headline, content, and action buttons. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/dialog.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```
Dialog title
A simple dialog with free-form content.
Ok
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing a Filled Tonal Button in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a filled tonal button using the md-filled-tonal-button element. Filled tonal buttons are used as a middle ground between filled and outlined buttons for lower-priority actions. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/button.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Tonal ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing FAB Appearance with CSS in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to customize the appearance of a regular FAB using CSS variables. It modifies colors, shapes, and sizes of the FAB component. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/fab.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` edit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Submenus in Material Web Menu Component DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create nested submenus within the md-menu component. It shows the usage of md-sub-menu elements and how to properly nest menus for multilevel navigation. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/menu.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` Menu with Submenus
Fruits with A
arrow_right
Apricot
Avocado
Apples
arrow_left
Fuji
Granny Smith
Red Delicious
Banana
Cucumber
 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Required Select Component in HTML DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a required select component using the 'required' attribute. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/select.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
One

 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Themed Dialog in HTML and CSS DESCRIPTION: Shows how to apply custom theming to a dialog using CSS variables for colors, typography, and shape. SOURCE: https://github.com/material-components/material-web/blob/main/docs/components/dialog.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```
Title
Dialog content
